abstract: Madonna Badger plans to sue the city of Stamford, Conn, in connection with 2011 death of her three daughters and parents in a fire in her home; Badger is accusing the city of demolishing the remains of her burned house before the cause of the blaze could be determined and says that its actions caused her $3 million in property damage and hurt her chances of collecting compensation for her losses.

byline.contributor: Elizabeth Maker contributed reporting from Stamford, Conn.

lead_paragraph: Madonna Badger, whose three daughters and parents died, is accusing the Connecticut city of demolishing the remains of her burned house before the cause of the blaze was determined.
